description: Utility functions for mapping lesson titles and IDs to audio and caption assets, including slug normalization, environment-based overrides, and runtime probing for asset existence.

methods.name: toSlug
methods.description: Converts a string into a URL-friendly slug by lowercasing, removing accents, non-alphanumeric characters, and replacing spaces with dashes.

methods.name: getAudioUrlForLesson
methods.description: Returns the legacy MP3 URL for a lesson based on its ID.

methods.name: getCaptionsUrlForLesson
methods.description: Returns the legacy captions JSON URL for a lesson based on its ID.

methods.name: inferFallbackCaptionLines
methods.description: Generates short caption lines from lesson description, summary, or title if captions are not available.

methods.name: mapLessonToAudio
methods.description: Resolves a lesson to its associated audio and caption asset URLs by generating candidate slugs and probing their existence at runtime.
